subject: Re: Order #SSN3516 confirmed
description_text:
URGENT: Request for documents for customs clearance - Order   #SSN3516

*Dear Simsonn Support Team,*

I am writing to request urgent assistance regarding my recent order,
*#SSN3516*, which is currently being held for customs clearance in Hungary.

To successfully complete the customs procedure and receive my package, the
customs authorities require the following specific documents:

   -

   *Invoice*
   -

   *Proof of Transfer* (Documentation of the transaction when the goods
   were paid for)
   -

   *Order Confirmation* (The one received via email from you after the
   purchase)
   -

   *Proof of Shipping Cost* (If the shipping cost was billed separately)

I would highly appreciate it if you could provide these documents as soon
as possible, as the deadline for customs submission is approaching.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.



*Sincerely, Benedek Kiss+36501035018*

SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> ezt írta (időpont: 2025. nov. 15., Szo,
19:04):
